'''Violet Ibis''' is a type of bird that can be found in the wild.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|2}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry in the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Violet Ibises can be found on every major Inazuman island, including along the path between [[Ritou]] and [[Konda Village]] and near [[Nazuchi Beach]] teleporter:
<gallery>
Wildlife Location Violet Ibis Ritou.png
Wildlife Location Violet Ibis Ritou 2.png
</gallery>

See the '''[https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=294 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Trivia==
* The bird may be based off the {{w|Crested ibis}} in real life, also called "toki" {{Lang|ja=トキ}}, or the Japanese crested ibis.
* There is a single Violet Ibis near [[Pardis Dhyai]] in [[Sumeru]] as well one by waterfalls next to the [[Statue of the Seven]] in [[Elynas]], [[Beryl Region]] in [[Fontaine]]. These are the only known specimens outside of Inazuma.
